name: Another Zombie Game
description:
Another Zombie Game is a game created in under 24 hours. It is a top down arcade shooter. You are shooting zombies and after you kill all the zombies, a portal appears and that will take you to the next room.

Controls:
LMB - Shoot
W - Forward
A - Left
S - Back
D - Right
R - Reload

How to Play:
Shoot all the zombies. Once all the zombies are killed, a portal will appear in the map. You must walk into it to teleport to the next room. During a room you can find powerups like weapons and ammo refills in the map. You can also kill zombies to get mini powerups like a random gun, ammo refill, and nuke.
